confirm-remove: All your data will be permanently erased. Do you really want to continue?
label-no-need-rgpd: Since you are not logged in, the application does not store any of your personnal data
label-rgpd: By logging in, you provide your email to AFKalc. It is never used but to allow your logging in. The data stored by the application are everything linked to : the abyssal expedition, the hero list, your campaign and vip progression, your priority lists and your favorites. You can delete your account anytime on the page.
